content.rendered:
The La Verne Portal campus portal integrates with the intranet, Exchange E-mail, student Gmail, Blackboard, and Banner Self Service so users can access the information and services they need through a single sign-on.

Benefits of using La Verne Portal

Once you log into the La Verne Portal, you will have access to important applications. You can view all important data  As well as have access to information only available to the University Community with log in credentials.

Links available in the QuickLaunch menu

Blackboard: Access your course material online.

Email Services: Outlook Email Exchange for faculty/staff and Gmail accounts available for students.

Banner self service:

  • As a student, you can also check your grades, class schedule, financial aid, student account balance, register for class, check the registration status, library account and more.
  • As a faculty member, you can also check your class roster, class schedule, input grades, check library account and more.
  • As a staff member, you can also check the departmental budget, go to Banner INB, search contact information for a faculty or staff, create or track a service desk work order and more.
